website_summaries.verdict: A dressier-looking alternative to the Ty sneaker style, with most of the same benefits.
pros: Good for climbing and other activities
Designed for stability, support and comfort for young walkers
cons: Running and activity can cause hook-and-loop closure to open

customer_reviews.title: Proud new PLAE parents!
customer_reviews.text: These are WONDERFUL! Our daughter loves them, we love them, everyone loves them! Well made, durable, comfortable, easy to put on and take off, and very very 'grippy' for easy climbing. Will definitely be sticking with this brand for the future. Also, the replaceable 'top strap' (as feet grow taller) is WONDERFUL! Easily a shoe that could last a year of wearing non-stop for school.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: I love the way they look and the fact that they ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute shoes. I love the way they look and the fact that they are washable. But for some reason, the back of them rubs my daughters ankles raw. She has to wear them with socks now.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Robak

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light for Summer
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Nice and light for Summer. Have washed already and came out nicely (air dry). Daughter seems comfortable in them and wears all day at school etc. I saw another review saying they didn't last long, but feel if that were to happen Amazon would stand behind their product. They seem to be holding up perfectly, but I will admit my daughter isn't playing soccer, hiking Mt Tam or kicking rocks in them : )
customer_reviews.author: J. Daigneault

customer_reviews.title: but since then they have been her favorite shoes. Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: During the first week we had to put bandaids on the back of her feet because the shoes cut into her skin, but since then they have been her favorite shoes. Comfortable, durable, and they still look great after weeks of hard play. Other shoes we have had did not hold up this well. Worth the higher cost of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality, but come loose
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of PLAE. These are very long-lasting shoes, but the velcro doesn't hold so well with kids who like to run around. It comes loose a lot.
customer_reviews.author: LBB

customer_reviews.title: Strap too short!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super disappointed in this shoe. The strap on one of the shoes is obviously shorter than the other and it's won't stay velcroed on. My child has average sized feet. Such a disappointment, as my child has already worn them outside and I can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: GDY

customer_reviews.title: They are the best shoe for my toddlers and they love them
customer_reviews.text: These are not our first pair of pale shoes! They are the best shoe for my toddlers and they love them!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Plew

customer_reviews.title: Love Plae but...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes usually, but strap wasn't long enough for her socks on these.
customer_reviews.author: ll2

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother. Poor sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Poor sizing. Wasted money and am STUCK with wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality and adorable style. Fits a bit larger than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Dunckel

customer_reviews.title: looks great and works great for an active child
customer_reviews.text: my 3 year old daughter loves the comfort, colors and fit
customer_reviews.author: Karishma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and comfort. Truly a well made shoe. Will definitely buy Plae shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Kari L. Losh

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect! My niece wanted to wear them as soon as she got them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Walters

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute; quick shipping; just a little too tight for my girl's comfort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfy
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 3 pairs of plae shoes now. This is our second pair of the sporty janes which are my daughters ultimate favorite shoes. The last pair she wore almost every single day to kindergarten and are now too small, and the Velcro has lost some of its stick. They stood up to a lot of wear, and now she is proudly sporting her new purple ones. We also have the pink camo high tops which I think are adorable as well, though my kiddo prefers these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable without socks too
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter has worn them constantly since they arrived. Very comfortable without socks too!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen Holz

customer_reviews.title: Our new favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has these shoes in the navy color and we absolutely love them. She has worn them every day to full day daycare, to the park, museums, etc for over two months and they dont show much wear or get smelly. She even peed on them once and the daycare threw them in the washer and they came out looking clean. She loves them as they are easy for her to put on and comfortable. I'm going to buy them again in the next size up when she outgrows them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: plae Kids' Emme Mary Jane Flat
product_meta.description: Emma - a plain jane she is not. Hop, skip and jump from school day to afternoon play to evening recital. AND Jazz up those jeans, tutus and surf trunks.
feature_bullets: Plae shoes are cool, durable, well-designed sneakers for kids.
A plain jane she is not. hop, skip and jump from school day to afternoon play to evening recital. And jazz up those jeans, tutus, and surf trunks.
Comes with a set of customizable tabs.
Recycled moisture wicking lining. Recycled air mesh upper for breathability.
Anti-microbial, anti-bacterial Eco-Ortholite uses a bio-oil, from a non-food source, as a substitute for traditional fossil fuel-based raw materials.
